content:
I am an undergraduate student major in Software Engineering in Najing University, China. I did research work in Nanjing University and Prof. Enyi Tang is my fantastic adviser. I spent a wonderful summer internship at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign hosted by Prof. Tianyin Xu in 2019. I was also a visiting student at Purdue University hosted by Prof. Xiangyu Zhang in Sepetember, 2019. Later I had a short experience at University of California, Santa Barbara.
My research interests include programming languages, program analysis, numerical analysis using programming language techniques and security. I want to build reliable tools and systems to guarantee the desired behavior of a system in a reliable and scalable way. I’m actively seeking for a PhD position in PL and Security.

title: Yu Pan
